atomate.tools.post_process package¶

Submodules¶

atomate.tools.post_process.gibbs module¶

Compute the quasi harmonic approximation gibbs free energy using phonopy.

atomate.tools.post_process.gibbs.get_collection(db_file)¶

connect to the database and return task collection

atomate.tools.post_process.gibbs.get_data(db_file, query)¶
atomate.tools.post_process.gibbs.get_db(db_file)¶

connect to the database and return the connection

atomate.tools.post_process.gibbs.get_gibbs(structure, db_file, eos='vinet', t_step=10, t_min=0, t_max=1000, mesh=(20, 20, 20), plot=False)¶
atomate.tools.post_process.gibbs.get_phonopy(structure)¶

atomate.tools.post_process.plot_raman module¶

atomate.tools.post_process.plot_raman.get_freq_intensities(input_file)¶

Return frequencies and normalized intensities from the json input file

Args:
input_file (str): path to the json file containing the raman tensors
Returns:
(numpy array, numpy array): frequencies, intensities
atomate.tools.post_process.plot_raman.lorentzian(w, wj, delta_w=4.0)¶

delta function approximation

Args:
w (float/np.ndarray): frequency wj (float): frequency where the delta function will be centered delta_w (float): peak width, default= 4 cm^-1(from the above paper)
Returns:
broadened delta function
atomate.tools.post_process.plot_raman.plot_spectrum(freq, intensities, lorentzian_width)¶

Plot the Raman spectrum.

Args:
freq (numpy array): frequencies intensities (numpy array): intensities computed from the raman tensors lorentzian_width (float): width of the lorentzian delta function
atomate.tools.post_process.plot_raman.raman_intensity(R)¶

Scattering intensity

Args:
R (3x3 numpy array): Susceptibility tensor
Returns:
float: scattering intensity according to Eq 7, Phys Rev B 73, 104304 2006
atomate.tools.post_process.plot_raman.run()¶
